text: Maaŋ muuŋgiap, ndu ntige suaŋrim, mbe guigira bigɨna bakɨ thera ana mbok mpɨrav kɨrim, ra phuni khegene vhɨzgiri. Nde muuŋv kɨrim, ana phorga rui gumgi zɨv, ana khuma kɨmgi, ŋgegɨv khaŋ mba gumgi gu mbigi ga suanga, ‘Ana rimgiap taagia khavgi.’ Maaŋ muuŋgirga, mbe guiguigi bunan kameŋ, ne ana fhum suaŋgi buneŋ kambarav guigira mbatɨgirga.”
